    About Me

    I am an incoming PhD student for 2025 in the School of Computer Science at University of Waterloo, supervised by Prof. Jian Zhao. This November, I start to work with Prof. Yong Wang at Nanyang Technological University as a Research Assistant.

    This June, I received my master‚Äôs degree with honor in Computer Science and Technology from Sichuan University, under the supervision of Prof. Min Zhu. In 2021, I received my bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science and Technology from Sichuan University.

    My research interests primarily revolve around human-notebook interaction, interactive tools for data science, human-computer interaction. This passion, cultivated and refined during my research internships with Prof. Jian Zhao at the University of Waterloo, and Prof. Huamin Qu at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology.
